trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the ALT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se foi premida a tecla ALT.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se foi premida a tecla ALT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the CTRL key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a tecla CTRL foi premida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se foi premida a tecla CTRL; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a key is a regular input key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma chave é uma chave de entrada regular.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard code for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código de teclado para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de chave para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de teclado para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the keyboard value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>representando o valor de teclado.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the modifier flags for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os sinalizadores de modificador para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the SHIFT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se foi premida a tecla SHIFT.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se foi premida a tecla SHIFT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
